name: Shrimper Moderators
description:
SHRIMPER MODERATORS

Keep your shrimp poison free by bonking those toxic pepegas.

Live is hard as a shrimper. You wake up and go to the river to keep your shrimp in check. There will always be some toxicity here and there but you keep going. YEP

Made for Arkav Game Jam 2021 by 25w[atts]

The theme for the jam was STREAM, and uh yeah in this game you are a moderator for a "shrimper" bonking those toxic "shrimp" with the power of your "bonk" hammer. Also river lol.
